hyysguyang wrote:

> But the requirement in my top post is :
> Requirement: Reverse the setence 'TDD is a software devolopment
> technology' to 'technology devolopment software a is TDD'.
> Attention please, this is all requirement. No other sentence need to
> be reverse.

In that case, your method always returns 'technology devolopment 
software a is TDD'. Why would you write code that parses the sentence 
and reverses it, when you can just return the only possible answer? If 
the correct answer is always 6, why not just always return 6?

Take care.
